title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Permit Contacts
body: Permit Office Contacts       How do I apply for a permit? Requests for permits are taken by phone and/or e-mail in the order received. Leave a voice message and your call will be returned. Below are a list of contact information for the Permit Office. Please contact the appropriate ranger for your activity. Commercial Use Authorizations and Still Photography Permits Jovanna Gonzalez Office of Special Park Uses Desk and voice mail: (805) 370-2369 Motion Picture, Special Events, and Filming Permits Catharine Beverly-Bishop Special Park Uses Coordinator Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area Desk and voice mail: (805) 370-2308
